name: Zombie Abolisher
description:
How to Play:

Zombies will spawn from the Spawners and will endlessly target the Player. To kill the Zombies, you must shoot them by using your gun called the Abolisher. If you touch a Zombie, you'll lose health so get out of the way quickly. You can shoot rocks to find coins to boost your score. This is an endless Zombie shooter so try to get the highest score possible.  Can you get over 100,000 points? 

Game Controls:
WASD Keys or Arrow Keys: moves the Player
Mouse: aims in any direction
Left Mouse Button: shoot bullets

5 Key Features:

Abolisher Gun:  an excellent weapon for Zombie Hunters

Types of Zombies: each of these zombies have their own score, damage and health properties. Identify them and use whatever means necessary to defeat them

Collectables: collect coins to boost your score

Shootable Containers: shoot rocks to find coins

High Score: What score can you get?
